ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: GitHub and Slack Integration
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When I want to integrate GitHub and Slack to Plane but its not integrating. I see the spinner for a long time but its not working. ### Steps to reproduce 1. Go to workspace settings 2. Then go to Integrations 3. Click GitHub or Slack Integration 4. Do what Plane need to connect your repo or chat 5. And wait and watch spinner for hours ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Cloud
